page.title: 17RECREATION The Coppice
page.content: The Coppice is a playground lying north of a large local authority housing estate. Equipment. 2 climbing posts(wooden),4 baby swings,on grass with safety bars,6 ordinary swings,1 set of monkey bars,4 slides in twos,4 types of climbing frames,1 roundabout(16 seats),1 seasaw. The playground is on two levels, most of the equipment was on a lower level including four bench seats. The playground was created for people living within a quarter mile of the area. Landscaping. There is a grassed hill with paths either side .There is an old wood at the back of the hill, and new trees at the front.The grass is cut once a fortnight during the summer.
